Method Detail

setRetail

public void setRetail(Retail retail)
Set the a Retail for the Map View. Necessary to utilize the following methods hasNextFloor(), setNextFloor(), hasPreviousFloor(), setPreviousFloor(), setFloor(int)

Parameters:
retail - the retail to be loaded

hasRetailLoaded

public boolean hasRetailLoaded()
Verifies if the view has a loaded retail;

Returns:
true if has a retail loaded, otherwise false

setOnMapViewLoadListener

public void setOnMapViewLoadListener(OnMapViewLoadListener listener)
Set the listener for the errors and load state of the view

Parameters:
listener - the listener to the callback for the errors and map load notifications

setRetail

public void setRetail(Retail retail,
                      OnMapViewLoadListener listener)
Set the a Retail for the Map View. Necessary to utilize the following methods hasNextFloor(), setNextFloor(), hasPreviousFloor(), setPreviousFloor(), setFloor(int)

Parameters:
retail - the retail to be loaded
OnMapViewLoadListener - the listener to the callback for the errors and map load notifications

setRetailById

public void setRetailById(java.lang.String retailId)
Set the a Retail for the Map View. Necessary to utilize the following methods hasNextFloor(), setNextFloor(), hasPreviousFloor(), setPreviousFloor(), setFloor(int)

Parameters:
retailId - the retailId of the retail to be loaded

setRetailById

public void setRetailById(java.lang.String retailId,

Parameters:
retailId - the retailid of the retail to be loaded
OnMapViewLoadListener - the listener to the callback for the errors and map load notifications

hasNextFloor

public boolean hasNextFloor()
Verify if the Retail loaded has a next floor to be shown. Requires that a Retail be loaded previously in setRetail(Retail)

Returns:
true if has a next floor, otherwise false

hasPreviousFloor

public boolean hasPreviousFloor()
Verify if the Retail loaded has a previous floor to be shown. Requires that a Retail be loaded previously in setRetail(Retail)

Returns:
true if has a next floor, otherwise false

setNextFloor

public void setNextFloor()
Set the view to show the retail next floor. Requires that a Retail be loaded previously in setRetail(Retail)

setPreviousFloor

public void setPreviousFloor()
Set the view to show the retail previous floor. Requires that a Retail be loaded previously in setRetail(Retail)

setFloor

public void setFloor(int floor)
Set the view to show the selected retail's floor. Requires that a Retail be loaded previously in setRetail(Retail)

Parameters:
floor - the floor to be shown

clearView

public void clearView()
Method to remove all the view loaded data.

setRetailMap

public void setRetailMap(RetailMap retailMap)
                  throws RetailMapImageInvalidException
Method to load a new image in the view. It uses the RetailMap.getMapDrawable() method. Warning: Do not utilize this when you are using the setRetail(Retail) method.

Parameters:
retailMap - the retailMap containing a bitmap.
Throws:
RetailMapImageInvalidException - thrown when the method RetailMap#getBitmap() returns null.

setLocationPoint

public void setLocationPoint(Location locationPoint)
Method to show a LocationPoint in the map. Won't show anything if the current map image floor is different than the location point floor.

Parameters:
newLocationPoint - a position to be plotted on the map

setUserPin

@Deprecated
public void setUserPin(int id)
Deprecated. 

focusOnUserPosition

public void focusOnUserPosition()
Method to focus on the user position.

Parameters:
newLocationPoint - a position to be plotted on the map
